We have used JFCUnit for an application based on a java2 swing applet,
living in 1.3 or 1.4 plugins, but there is no explicit support for
applets at all: you can write your tests against swing GUIs, confident
enough that building the application as an applet the behaviour will not
change. Well, almost. :-)

A suggestion from deep down of my heart: don't test the entire
application through the GUI, even using JFCUnit, or you will put
yourself in a dangerous situation. Just test a thin layer, checking if
your GUIs are matching a defined dynamic. Mock objects may help in this
case.

Cheers, Giuliano
